column1: : PhotoboothMgr background/foreground layout description file
: This file has a line entry for each background/foreground layout, by name and functionality.
:   The data is stored in comma delimited colums -
:   'Name','Action Set','Folder', giflayers, customlayers, fg, bk, mult, layer 1 bk, layer 2 bk,
:   layer 3 bk, layer 4 bk, 'ratio file folder'
: The following are the internal Visual Basic variables that receive this file data, with comments.
: BkFgName(256) As String           ' name of the layout
: BkFgSetName(256) As String        ' photoshop action set name that this bk/fg action is found in
: BkFgFolder(256) As String         ' background top level folder name
: BkFgGifLayers(256) As Integer     ' number of guest images required to build a gif (ex:4 layer animations)
: BkFgCustLayers(256) As Integer    ' number of guest images required to build a print (ex:photo strips)
: BkFgFGSelect(256) As Int16        ' uses foreground? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes, check box
: BkFgBKSelect(256) As Int16        ' uses background? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes, check box
: BkFgMultLayers(256) As Int16      ' enable multiple bk/fg selection? -1 leave alone, 0=No, uncheck box, 1=Yes,check box
: BkFgImage1Bk(256) As Int16        ' 1 must always have one layout
: BkFgImage2Bk(256) As Int16        ' 2 if there is a 2nd layout, -1 = not used
: BkFgImage3Bk(256) As Int16        ' 3 if there is a 3rd layout, -1 = not used
: BkFgImage4Bk(256) As Int16        ' 4 if there is a 4th layout, -1 = not used
: BkFgAnimated(256) As Int16        ' Bk/Fg files are animation layers, 0=false, 1=true (use all four bk/fg files)
: BkFgRatio(256) as int16           ' Bitfield for ratios (print sizes) supported see below..
:   In the BkFgRatio field, we specify which outputs are supported by a
:   bitfield. The bit fields are:
: 00000001 00000000 - vertical images supported
: 00000010 00000000 - vertical Print actions carry bk/fg #s 1-4 in the name
: 00000100 00000000 - vertical Print actions carry the ratio names
: 00010000 00000000 - horizontal images supported
: 00100000 00000000 - horizontal Print actions carry bk/fg #s 1-4 in the name
: 01000000 00000000 - horizontal Print actions carry the ratio names
100-WaterFall
101-Washing Machine
102-Andy Warhol
103-Movie Private Screening
104-Slides Private Screening
105-Youtube
